channel.title: Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal (updated daily)
channel.description: The Saturday Morning Breakfast Cereal Blog

item.title: November 21, 2009
item.description: Kelly and I had to sample food for wedding planning. This is the first act of wedding planning since deciding to have a wedding that I've actively enjoyed. Coincidentally, it's also the first act of wedding planning that involved free cookies.

item.title: November 20, 2009
item.description:
BAM! Comic on time!

Can anyone explain to me why SMBC might get banned from being submitted on digg? I haven't had any luck getting through to a human, so I thought I'd ask the INTERNET. (PS: To be clear, I'm not looking for anyone to cause trouble or go for "Internet justice." Just thought I'd see if I could reach someone in the know)
